formattedAddress: 880 5th Ave Apt 1g, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 880 5th Ave Apt 1g, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
A basic office. Dr. Bloom is soft spoken, modest, meticulous, approachable. He removed a infected root canal and tooth. After his work I no longer had any infection in the area. He was patient and waited for my own bone to grow before proceeding..
I hope I won't ever need a implant again, but if I did I would have him do the work.

originalText.text: If I had known how easy my gum surgery would be, I would have done the procedure years ago! Dr Bloom is an excellent clinician, with a gentle and kind manner and touch. He guided me thru my surgery and recovery step by step, and I am extremely pleased with the beautiful results! His office staff is both professional and pleasant, from obtaining my appointments, assisting with my surgery and post-ops,  and making me comfortable while I was in the office. Definitely an unexpectedly positive experience!

originalText.text:
Dr Bloom is the best dentist I have been to.
His soft tone mannerisms walks me through the procedures before he perform it is a great comfort. I had an implant for my tooth and he executed he procedure perfectly which mean no pain. I do not feel rushed either. His staff was also excellent and courteous. Highly recommend. If you do not have his coverage, he will make sure that the paper work is filed so you can get money back from your carrier.

Thanks Dr B.

originalText.text: I discovered Dr. Bloom through my Dentist in Switzerland and haven't looked back. From the moment I walked into their office, I felt welcomed. After sitting down with Dr. Bloom, I felt safe and knew my teeth were in good hands. It's been over two years, now, and I am positive my teeth and gums have been saved because of Dr. Bloom and his team. They are thorough, gentle and care about my oral health and well being. I have to admit that I took a long sabbatical and was forced to see a Dentist. Dr. Bloom's amazing care, along with his staff, is the ONLY reason I'm consistent with my appointments and continue going.

originalText.text: Dr. Bloom was recommended when my son needed oral surgery because he really IS the best in the field.   The result was complete recovery with a beautiful gum line that looks untouched!  Dr. Bloom even called us to follow up on how he was feeling!  Who does that these days?  Only the best!  Very grateful to have him in NYC.
